column1: # StateCU location climate station assignment information as delimited list file.
# See also the associated location and collection files.
# # Open a log file to save a record of processing
# # Simple example to define two CU locations and write files.

# # Fill the CU location information from HydroBase and then assign
# # Write as list and StateCU files
# HydroBase database is: HydroBase_CO_20090701 on AMAZON

# HydroBase table structure for software is at least 2007052520070525
